feature.label: Patina Features
feature.description:
PATINA / Epiprov is a set of Eclipse plugins (Xtext/EMF/Epsilon) for: - detecting clusters and decomposing models (ProvN/Emodl), - trust evaluation (TrustDSL) with opinion aggregation, - name-based comparison and merging with Epsilon (ECL/EML), - automatic warnings for low trust projections.
After installation, two actions appear in the main toolbar and context-menu entries are added for *.provn and *.trustdsl files. See the GitHub page for documentation and installation instructions.
